dc:title: Spring Appeal - April 1965
dc:creator: Dorothy Day

dc:description.P: Asks for help in "this seemingly hopeless and profligate task of feeding the poor." Says she is looking on the face of Christ in the poor she meets in her travels. Keywords: war, poverty

dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 824 1965-04-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
